name: Flying Sword
speed: 0 ft., fly 50 ft. It can hover.

abilities.name: Antimagic Susceptibility.
abilities.description: The sword is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the sword must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

abilities.name: False Appearance.
abilities.description: While the sword remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal sword.
